title: Sports Team – Microshow at Green Room in Minneapolis (full concert, live for The Current)
description:
On Saturday, April 8, 2023, London-based six-piece rock band Sports Team played a raucous, hourlong show at Green Room, one of the newest venues in Minneapolis. The audience consisted of lucky winners who had entered for a chance to attend this one-of-a-kind performance.

Sports Team released their second studio album, Gulp!, in September 2022.  The record followed their 2020 Mercury Prize-nominated debut album Deep Down Happy, which charted at No. 2 in the U.K.’s Official Charts, achieving the highest vinyl sales for a debut British artist in 2020. 

Watch Sports Team’s full performance from Green Room above. The Current's Microshow series is supported by Fat Tire Classic Ale.

00:00:11 Here It Comes Again
00:02:34 The Game
00:05:31 Happy (God’s Own Country)

00:12:10 The Races

00:36:20 The Drop 
00:39:26 Here’s The Thing 
00:43:13 Kutcher
00:46:43 Stanton

@SportsTeam are:
Alex Rice – lead vocals
Rob Knaggs – rhythm guitar, vocals
Henry Young – lead guitar
Oli Dewdney – bass
Al Greenwood – drums
Ben Mack – keyboards

title: Maygen and the Birdwatcher – Take it to the Garden (live for The Current)
description:
Maygen and the Birdwatcher released their debut album, Moonshine, in 2021, almost instantly earning accolades from the Midwest Country Music Awards for Album of the Year and Americana Artist of the Year.

Last October, Maygen and the Birdwatcher released the follow-up album, Bootleggin’ At The Flower Shoppe. The band visited The Current studio to play three songs for Radio Heartland. Watch their performance of "Take It To The Garden," above.

Watch the full session, including the band's interview with host Mike Pengra: https://youtu.be/9cngC77KfZw
